tasks.build:npm: VERSION=$(deno run scripts/get-version.ts) && deno run --allow-env=DENO_TRACE_PERMISSIONS,TS_ETW_MODULE_PATH,DENO_DIR,HOME,DENO_AUTH_TOKENS --allow-read --allow-write=./npm --allow-run=npm scripts/build_npm.ts $VERSION
tasks.publish: deno run publish:deno && deno run publish:npm
tasks.build-publish: deno run build && deno run publish
